title: Frequent Client PVP.net Timeouts in-game/Disconnections?
body:
I keep getting random Client PVP.net timeouts that completely disconnects the game even though my internet is fine. The ping cuts to 500ms which is a straight up disconnection.

I'm on the Mac client, MacBook Pro 13", anyone else having issues?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for me and let me know if anything helps.

Sorry for the delayed response.
